thread.title: *WeProduce | Help Kickstart The Apparel Production Revolution
thread.title_full: *WeProduce | Help Kickstart The Apparel Production Revolution - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: *WeProduce | Help Kickstart The Apparel Production Revolution
text:
*WeProduce, an innovative new startup, launches a Kickstarter to get the creative community involved in Revolutionizing the Clothing Industry!
Los Angeles, California (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
*WeProduce is a revolutionary new apparel production service that helps anyone, with creativity and a vision to start a clothing line, without any upfront costs, set up fees, minimums, or inventory. For around $15 dollars a piece, they print, pack, and ship client designs on high quality T-shirts, on-demand, to their customers anywhere in the world, from one of their multiple international facilities. All they need is artwork.
“We want to break down the barriers of entry to the fashion world, to allow small brands with big ideas to make an Impact!” Says Michael Seiler, Founder of *WeProduce, “This is really the first step in revolutionizing the fashion Industry. It is a people’s movement: Helping creatives become entrepreneurs! So we are taking to Kickstarter to build our tribe!”
*WeProduce is seeking to raise $50,000 to finish our user interface software, which gives creatives a powerful suite of tools to manage the product creation, and production of branded apparel. They are targeting Backers from the Creative and Entrepreneurial Communities, whom they anticipate will get the most value from this service: Artists, Designers, Stores, Bands, and Brands.
Exclusive 2016 registration will be taken solely from Kickstarter backers, and spaces are limited.
Explore The Kickstarter
*WeProduce is the first service of it’s kind designed exclusively for the entrepreneurial creative. Built for the novice designer and the established company alike, *WeProduce has all the tools needed to start, build, and manage a T-shirt line, the cornerstone of any fashion brand.
“This is a service that so many people need! It is the future of apparel production and fulfillment, Period.” Says Seiler, "We really want our backers to be the first to experience just how easy it is to start and run a clothing line with *WeProduce!"
He goes on, “We’re that service that is going to help some kid sketching in their bedroom right now to become the next big thing! - And we couldn't be more excited!”
*WeProduce works behind the scenes allowing clients to offer their customers a completely branded experience: Their branded URL, their store, their product, their labels, even their packing slips and packaging. The system connects to most existing online stores so that the moment an order is placed, it goes directly into their production queue for printing. Totally automated.
About *WeProduce:
*WeProduce is an on demand production and fulfillment service for printed apparel, founded in 2015. It is currently producing 1000+ shirts per month, for about 50 clients, from 3 facilities in the US and UK. Automation and order fulfillment systems are running smoothly, and they have the capability to ramp production up to 60,000 pieces a month with our current (small) set-up.
About Michael Seiler:
Michael is a well established creative professional with 20 years of experience in the fashion industry. He is best known for his work as a Creative Director for a number of notable sportswear brands and, in large part, for redefining the look of contemporary men’s fashion.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13031133.htm
